summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. WHILE MAKING A LEFT TURN, THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY BEGAN TO HESITATE, SHOOK, AND FAILED TO ACCELERATE PROPERLY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TRANSMISSION SHIFT MECHANISM WAS FAULTY AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED APPROXIMATELY 1 1/2 YEARS LATER. THE CONTACTED INDICATED THAT THE TRANSMISSION SHIFT MECHANISM WAS REPLACED A SECOND TIME AND EVENTUALLY FAILED AGAIN. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 13,000.   UPDATED 10/18/16*LJ  *TR
